citations.narrative:
The set of stairs on the right side of the first inside pool housing 3 sea lions are not level .They are sitting at an angle to
the deck creating a space at bottom of the stairs that could catch a flipper of a sea lion causing injury. Stairs not sitting
level also may move with the weight of the largest animal in the pool. The stairs must be made level and the space
reduced at the bottom to prevent animal injury and all housing facilities maintained in good repair to prevent injury .
CORRECT BY : 5/18/2023

There is a rough area on the left corner of the first wooden deck on the left of the fist indoor pool housing 3 sea lions. The
wood is exposed in this area and beginning to deteriorate . As wooden surfaces deteriorate they can no longer be
properly cleaned. The surface of this deck must be repaired or replaced and all surfaces maintained as part of a regular
ongoing maintenance program .
CORRRECT BY : 5/18/2023
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with a facility employee.
Additional Inspectors:
Laurie Gage, Field Zoological Species Specialist n
